name: Space Spaghetti Survival
description:
We don't have a webGL build because the physics of our cabling system takes way too much ressources, its not really playable. Sorry.

The Game

You are in charge of an old spaceship. You must keep your ship running by allocating resources to the stressed systems. Unfortunately, the automatic resource management system just died. You must connect the systems manually using the matching cables.

Keep your ship running as long as you can while going through pirate attacks, asteroid fields and a slew of other dangers

The Jam

This game was made by a team of 2 devs for the Lost Relic Game Jam 2022 from the 11th of June (12:00am AEST) to the 19th of June (11:59pm AEST).

The Theme was :

The Controls Control SchemeKeyboard & MouseGamepadMoveWASD/ZQSDLeft StickInteractSpace BarSouth Button 3rd Party Assets

Asset Forge Deluxe

Boss Spaceship 2D Sprites Pixel Art

Space Game Backgrounds

200+ Space Sound Effects (Various Futuristic SFX)

33 Game Background Music (Infinite Loops)
